info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Union County through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Lancaster, or near Andrew Jackson State Park, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waxhaw and Jaars. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
